globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
After tracking Dengar and his party of bounty hunters for days, your search has finally brought you here. Your intelligence indicates that Dengar will transfer Taya Vontaq, the Rebel operative from Dathomir, into Imperial custody in a prisoner exchange in a nearby valley. Only a stinking sewer, an icy mountain trail, and a stubborn rockfall block your path.

"Well, those and Dengar’s heavily-armed associates,” your pilot reminds you.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: A rockfall is blocking the way to the valley.

entityProperties.name: Obstruction 1
entityProperties.theText:
A rockfall is blocking your path here. It is impossible to see what lies behind it.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing an obstruction, click "Enter".

entityProperties.name: Obstruction 2
entityProperties.theText:
A rockfall is blocking your path here. It is impossible to see what lies behind it.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing an obstruction, click "Enter".

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing an obstruction, click the obstruction and select "Enter".
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing an obstruction, click the obstruction and select "Enter".
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You load the weary prisoner onto your shuttle and blast away from the planet. Taya looks at you and mutters a quiet, “Thank you,” before she passes out from exhaustion.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The bounty hunters keep you pinned down with relentless fire. An engine roars, and in the sky you see an Imperial transport zooming toward the ground. Taya is loaded onto the ship, still screaming for your help.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">Dengar</color> (Ruthless Killer) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Imperial Interests
globalEvents.eventText: Suddenly, you spot a man in the uniform of an Imperial officer watching over the scene. Of course. Where a bounty hunter is, his client is usually not far. The Empire appears to have taken some interest in Taya.

globalEvents.name: Guarding his Prisoner
globalEvents.eventText: As you finally make your way across the rockfall, you arrive in a small valley. Behind some rocks, you can see Taya Vontaq, shackled, writhing helplessly. "HELP!", she calls out as she spots you.

entityProperties.name: Obstruction 1
entityProperties.theText:
A rockfall is blocking your path here. It is impossible to see what lies behind it.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.

entityProperties.theText:

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.

entityProperties.name: Prisoner
entityProperties.theText:
Taya Vontaq, the Dathomiri spy that Dengar has caught, is struggling with the shackles that immobilize her. 

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with Taya to retrieve her.

eventActions.theText: {-} The Rebel mission token represents Taya. A Rebel figure can interact with Taya to retrieve her.

As you move closer, Taya calls out again. "Watch out! That sleemo is still around somewhere!" She has barely finished when a man with a scarred face steps forth from behind the rocks. And he is not alone.
You call in your shuttle, which approaches within seconds, hovering over a point not far away from you and Taya.

entityProperties.name: Extraction Point
entityProperties.theText:
Your shuttle is hovering over this point. If you can make it there with Taya, and shake off the pursuit, you can escape from this place.

{-} If <color="red">Dengar</color> is not on the Holding Zone (tile CORE 1A) or the Extraction Point (green highlight), a Rebel figure carrying Taya can escape through the Extraction Point.

eventActions.theText:
{-} If <color="red">Dengar</color> is not on the Holding Zone (tile CORE 1A) or the Extraction Point (green highlight), a Rebel figure carrying Taya can escape through the Extraction Point.
{-} The Rebels win when the Rebel carrying Taya escapes.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent obstructions. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing an obstruction. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} Line of sight cannot be traced and spaces cannot be counted through a space containing an obstruction.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents Taya. A Rebel figure can interact with Taya to retrieve her.
{-} If <color="red">Dengar</color> is not on the Holding Zone (tile CORE 1A) or the Extraction Point (green highlight), a Rebel figure carrying Taya can escape through the Extraction Point.
{-} The Rebels win when the Rebel carrying Taya escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Taya Retrieved
globalEvents.eventText:
You help Taya up, but the shackles and the exhaustion are too much. You need to carry her.

{-} If <color="red">Dengar</color> is not on the Holding Zone (tile CORE 1A) or the Extraction Point (green highlight), a Rebel figure carrying Taya can escape through the Extraction Point.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the extraction point.

Is <color="red">Dengar</color> on the Holding Zone (tile CORE 1A) or the Extraction Point (green highlight)?

globalEvents.name: Dengar Yes
globalEvents.eventText: You need to get rid of Dengar before you can escape with Taya.
